attributes.action: Cameron & Clegg stop pussy footing about the Riots & get the army in NOW
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that the civil unrest due to the hooliganism & 'rioting' around the country is too much for the police to handle.... get the Army in to do what the do best... let them fight THIS country's war 7 stop the riots NOW!

Furthermore make them pay for the damage they have done & don't let them off with a slapped wrist....... the Tax payers Shouldn't have to clean up this mess!
